${ModID}:TemporaryPowerDemo.NAME: Auto-Generated Temporary Power
${ModID}:TemporaryPowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scry this turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Card Parsing, Card Selection, Card Mods
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:InlineCardModDemo.NAME: Inline Card Mods
${ModID}:InlineCardModDemo.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Strike of any color to your hand. NL Enchant it with "Kills Spikers."

${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.NAME: Multiple Previews - One Card
${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random Upgraded *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:Backstab.NAME: Backstab
${ModID}:Backstab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !${ModID}:sd! additional damage for each stack of ${ModID}:Sus on the target.

${ModID}:CleanKill.NAME: Clean Kill
${ModID}:CleanKill.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Deal !D! damage and apply 2 ${ModID}:Sus, or deal !D! damage and remove 1 of your ${ModID}:Votes.

${ModID}:Babushka.NAME: Babushka
${ModID}:Babushka.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.  Gain !M! ${ModID}:Vote.

${ModID}:KillOnCams.NAME: Kill on Cams
${ModID}:KillOnCams.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Gain !M! ${ModID}:Votes.  Draw a card.

${ModID}:DoubleKill.NAME: Double Kill
${ModID}:DoubleKill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then deal !D! damage to a random enemy. Gain !M! ${ModID}:Votes.

${ModID}:NeckSnap.NAME: Neck Snap
${ModID}:NeckSnap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Apply 1 Weak per ${ModID}:Sus on the target.

${ModID}:Jab.NAME: Jab
${ModID}:Jab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Apply 1 Vulnerable per ${ModID}:Sus on the target.

${ModID}:Gunshot.NAME: Gunshot
${ModID}:Gunshot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  If the enemy has Vulnerable, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Skewer.NAME: Skewer
${ModID}:Skewer.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak.  Deal !D! damage for each stack of Weak.

${ModID}:LaserBeam.NAME: Laser Beam
${ModID}:LaserBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies.  Gain [R] for each target hit that has ${ModID}:Sus.

${ModID}:StackTheBodies.NAME: Stack the Bodies
${ModID}:StackTheBodies.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Deal !D! damage again for each enemy with ${ModID}:Sus.

${ModID}:KillAFKCrewmate.NAME: Kill afk Crewmate
${ModID}:KillAFKCrewmate.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage.  Gain !M! Vigor.

${ModID}:StackKill.NAME: Stack Kill
${ModID}:StackKill.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Deal !D! damage for each enemy and apply !M! ${ModID}:Sus NL or NL Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage for each enemy and apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Sus.

${ModID}:KillInSeclusion.NAME: Kill in Seclusion
${ModID}:KillInSeclusion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Remove all of your ${ModID}:Votes. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:KillInPlainSight.NAME: Kill in Plain Sight
${ModID}:KillInPlainSight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Gain a random amount ${ModID}:Votes from 1 to 3.
${ModID}:KillInPlainSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Gain a random amount ${ModID}:Votes from 2 to 3.

${ModID}:DriveByKill.NAME: Drive By Kill
${ModID}:DriveByKill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Apply !M! ${ModID}:Sus to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:HuntedDown.NAME: Hunted Down
${ModID}:HuntedDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Deal !D! damage again for each stack of ${ModID}:Sus on the target.  Gain !M! ${ModID}:Votes.

${ModID}:KillAndRun.NAME: Kill And Run
${ModID}:KillAndRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Gain !B! Block.  Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:StealthKill.NAME: Stealth Kill
${ModID}:StealthKill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Apply !M! ${ModID}:Votes to a random enemy.

${ModID}:SelfReport.NAME: Self Report
${ModID}:SelfReport.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Trigger all ${ModID}:Votes. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:KillAtO2.NAME: Kill at O2
${ModID}:KillAtO2.DESCRIPTION: Play 1 Power from your draw pile.  Deal !D! damage for each Power played this combat.  Gain !M! ${ModID}:Votes. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:KillAtReactor.NAME: Kill at Reactor
${ModID}:KillAtReactor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Draw cards until you have !M! in your hand.  Gain [R] for each Power, Status, or Curse card in your hand.

${ModID}:KillDuringChaos.NAME: Kill During Chaos
${ModID}:KillDuringChaos.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  If the target has any ${ModID}:Votes, gain [R].  If the target has any ${ModID}:Sus, draw !M! card.
${ModID}:KillDuringChaos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  If the target has any ${ModID}:Votes, gain [R] [R].  If the target has any ${ModID}:Sus, draw !M! card.

${ModID}:KillInTheDark.NAME: Kill in the Dark
${ModID}:KillInTheDark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Apply !M! ${ModID}:Sus, !M! ${ModID}:Vote, !M! Vulnerable, and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ChartCourse.NAME: Chart Course
${ModID}:ChartCourse.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy.  Apply !M! ${ModID}:Sus.

${ModID}:CheckSecurity.NAME: Check Security
${ModID}:CheckSecurity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  Draw !M! card.  If it is a Skill, ${ModID}:Vent.

${ModID}:CheckVitals.NAME: Check Vitals
${ModID}:CheckVitals.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is at or above 50% HP, apply !M! Weak.  If the enemy is at or below 50% HP, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:ClearAsteroids.NAME: Clear Asteroids
${ModID}:ClearAsteroids.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  Draw an Attack card.  Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Vote.
${ModID}:ClearAsteroids.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  Draw 2 Attack cards.  Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Vote.

${ModID}:EmptyChute.NAME: Empty Chute
${ModID}:EmptyChute.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards.  Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.  Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Vote.

${ModID}:EmptyGarbage.NAME: Empty Garbage
${ModID}:EmptyGarbage.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card and discard !M! card.  Gain !B! Block.  Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Vote.
${ModID}:EmptyGarbage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and discard !M! cards.  Gain !B! Block.  Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Vote.

${ModID}:EnterIDCode.NAME: Enter ID Code
${ModID}:EnterIDCode.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random amount of Block from 0 to 9 for each enemy. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EnterIDCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain a random amount of Block from 0 to 9 for each enemy. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:InspectSamples.NAME: Inspect Samples
${ModID}:InspectSamples.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RebootWiFi.NAME: Reboot Wi-Fi
${ModID}:RebootWiFi.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  Next turn, draw !M! additional card.

${ModID}:RewindTapes.NAME: Rewind Tapes
${ModID}:RewindTapes.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.
${ModID}:RewindTapes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.  Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.

${ModID}:StabilizeSteering.NAME: Stabilize Steering
${ModID}:StabilizeSteering.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity.  At the end of your turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

${ModID}:UnlockManifolds.NAME: Unlock Manifolds
${ModID}:UnlockManifolds.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random amount of Block from !B! to !M!.

${ModID}:AlignEngineOutput.NAME: Align Engine Output
${ModID}:AlignEngineOutput.DESCRIPTION: If you discarded a card this turn, gain [R] [R].

${ModID}:CheckSensorLogs.NAME: Check Sensor Logs
${ModID}:CheckSensorLogs.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Votes and !${ModID}:m2! Sus.  Remove 1 of your ${ModID}:Votes.
${ModID}:CheckSensorLogs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Votes and !${ModID}:m2! Sus.  Remove 2 of your ${ModID}:Votes.

${ModID}:CheckAdmin.NAME: Check Admin
${ModID}:CheckAdmin.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to yourself and ALL enemies.

${ModID}:CleanO2Filter.NAME: Clean O2 Filter
${ModID}:CleanO2Filter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block 6 times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CleanVents.NAME: Clean Vents
${ModID}:CleanVents.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill this turn, apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.  ${ModID}:Vent.
${ModID}:CleanVents.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill this turn, apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.  ${ModID}:Vent twice.

${ModID}:DivertPower.NAME: Divert Power
${ModID}:DivertPower.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 until the end of the turn.  If that card was an Attack, gain 1 Strength.  If that card was a Skill, gain 1 Dexterity.  If that card was a Power, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

${ModID}:DownloadData.NAME: Download Data
${ModID}:DownloadData.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  Draw !M! card.  Add 1 *Upload *Data to your hand.
${ModID}:DownloadData.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  Draw !M! card.  Add 1 *Upload *Data+ to your hand.

${ModID}:FillCanisters.NAME: Fill Canisters
${ModID}:FillCanisters.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  Add 1 *Fuel *Canister to your hand at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:FixWiring.NAME: Fix Wiring
${ModID}:FixWiring.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice.  Next turn, gain !B! Block.
${ModID}:FixWiring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice.  Next turn, gain !B! Block twice.

${ModID}:FuelEngines.NAME: Fuel Engines
${ModID}:FuelEngines.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Fuel *Canister to your hand.  Put a *Fuel *Canister into your hand at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust
${ModID}:FuelEngines.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Fuel *Canister to your hand.  Put a *Fuel *Canister into your hand at the start of your next 2 turns. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:HolsterWeapons.NAME: Holster Weapons
${ModID}:HolsterWeapons.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength and gains !${ModID}:m2! Weak. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PrimeShields.NAME: Prime Shields
${ModID}:PrimeShields.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity.  All skills in your hand cost 0 until end of turn.  Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Vote. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ProcessData.NAME: Process Data
${ModID}:ProcessData.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Sus to ALL enemies.  Draw !${ModID}:m2! card.
${ModID}:ProcessData.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Sus to ALL enemies.  Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards.

${ModID}:ResetBreakers.NAME: Reset Breakers
${ModID}:ResetBreakers.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.  Otherwise, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:RunDiagnostics.NAME: Run Diagnostics
${ModID}:RunDiagnostics.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor.  Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
${ModID}:RunDiagnostics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor.  Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.  ${ModID}:Vent.

${ModID}:StartReactor.NAME: Start Reactor
${ModID}:StartReactor.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and discard a card.  1 random card in your hand costs 0 this turn.
${ModID}:StartReactor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and discard a card.  2 random cards in your hand cost 0 this turn.

${ModID}:AssembleArtifact.NAME: Assemble Artifact
${ModID}:AssembleArtifact.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:AssembleArtifact.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block.  Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BuyBeverage.NAME: Buy Beverage
${ModID}:BuyBeverage.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Gold.  Obtain 1 of 3 random potions. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BuyBeverage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Obtain 1 of 3 random potions. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CalibrateDistributor.NAME: Calibrate Distributor
${ModID}:CalibrateDistributor.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Calibrate *Again into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:CalibrateDistributor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Calibrate *Again+ into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EmergencyMeeting.NAME: Emergency Meeting
${ModID}:EmergencyMeeting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double all enemies' ${ModID}:Sus and ${ModID}:Votes.  Trigger all ${ModID}:Votes. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:UnlockSafe.NAME: Unlock Safe
${ModID}:UnlockSafe.DESCRIPTION: Play 1 of !M! random cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CalibrateAgain.NAME: Calibrate Again
${ModID}:CalibrateAgain.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Distributor *Calibrated into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:CalibrateAgain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Distributor *Calibrated+ into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:UploadData.NAME: Upload Data
${ModID}:UploadData.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block.  Discard 1 card.  Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:HardAccusations.NAME: Hard Accusations
${ModID}:HardAccusations.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 4 cards in a single turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Vote and apply 2 ${ModID}:Votes to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:JamCommunications.NAME: Jam Comms
${ModID}:JamCommunications.DESCRIPTION: Choose: ${ModID}:Votes now trigger at 7 stacks among us, or ${ModID}:Votes now trigger at 13 stacks among us.

${ModID}:SeismicInstability.NAME: Seismic Instability
${ModID}:SeismicInstability.DESCRIPTION: When an enemy attacks, apply 1 Vulnerable.  When an enemy gains Block, apply 1 Weak.

${ModID}:DistributorCalibrated.NAME: Distributor Calibrated
${ModID}:DistributorCalibrated.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, remove 1 of your ${ModID}:Votes, apply 10 ${ModID}:Sus and 3 ${ModID}:Votes to ALL enemies, then ${ModID}:Vent.

${ModID}:DepleteOxygen.NAME: Deplete Oxygen
${ModID}:DepleteOxygen.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, the enemy loses X+1 HP.
${ModID}:DepleteOxygen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When attacked, the enemy loses X+3 HP.

${ModID}:Marination.NAME: Marination
${ModID}:Marination.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Sus to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:WaterPlants.NAME: Water Plants
${ModID}:WaterPlants.DESCRIPTION: All Attacks in your hand deal !M! additional damage this combat.  If you have played *Monitor *Tree this turn, double the increase.

${ModID}:DressMannequin.NAME: Dress Mannequin
${ModID}:DressMannequin.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards.  If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! ${ModID}:Sus.

${ModID}:StartFans.NAME: Start Fans
${ModID}:StartFans.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Artifact from the enemy.  ${ModID}:Vent. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MonitorTree.NAME: Monitor Tree
${ModID}:MonitorTree.DESCRIPTION: All skills in your hand gain !M! additional Block this combat.  If you have played *Water *Plants this turn, double the increase.

${ModID}:InsertKeys.NAME: Insert Keys
${ModID}:InsertKeys.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate.  Retain. NL Remove !M! of your ${ModID}:Votes.

${ModID}:DevelopPhotos.NAME: Develop Photos
${ModID}:DevelopPhotos.DESCRIPTION: Apply 15 ${ModID}:Sus to ALL enemies. End your turn.

${ModID}:StoreArtifacts.NAME: Store Artifacts
${ModID}:StoreArtifacts.DESCRIPTION: Rare cards in your hand cost 0 this combat.  At the end of combat, gain 1 common Relic. NL Fleeting.
${ModID}:StoreArtifacts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Rare cards in your hand cost 0 this combat.  At the end of combat, gain 1 common Relic. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FixShower.NAME: Fix Shower
${ModID}:FixShower.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a random card in your deck. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SabotageDoors.NAME: Sabotage Doors
${ModID}:SabotageDoors.DESCRIPTION: Whenever ${ModID}:Sus or ${ModID}:Vote is applied or gained, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:ScanBoardingPass.NAME: Scan Boarding Pass
${ModID}:ScanBoardingPass.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Remove a random debuff from yourself.  Add 1 *Swipe *Card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PolishRuby.NAME: Polish Ruby
${ModID}:PolishRuby.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Artifact.  Gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:VentHopping.NAME: Vent Hopping
${ModID}:VentHopping.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 of Vulnerable, Frail, or Weak to yourself randomly.  ${ModID}:Vent.  Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.
${ModID}:VentHopping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 of Vulnerable, Frail, or Weak to yourself randomly.  ${ModID}:Vent.  Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:FixWeatherNode.NAME: Fix Weather Node
${ModID}:FixWeatherNode.DESCRIPTION: Discard your draw pile.  Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

${ModID}:ImposterVision.NAME: ImposterVision
${ModID}:ImposterVision.DESCRIPTION: Reduce ${ModID}:Sus by only half when triggered.

${ModID}:MeasureWeather.NAME: Measure Weather
${ModID}:MeasureWeather.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity and Strength until end of turn.  Gain 1 more for each Act you have overcome.

${ModID}:RecordTemperature.NAME: Record Temperature
${ModID}:RecordTemperature.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Each enemy loses HP equal to their Sus, or gain Block equal to the total Sus of ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:RecordTemperature.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose: Each enemy loses HP equal to their Sus, or gain Block equal to the total Sus of ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SortSamples.NAME: Sort Samples
${ModID}:SortSamples.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Attack in your hand, gain !B! Block for each Skill in your hand, and draw !M! card for each Power in your hand.

${ModID}:CrashCourse.NAME: Crash Course
${ModID}:CrashCourse.DESCRIPTION: When ${ModID}:Sus or ${ModID}:Vote triggers, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:OpenWaterways.NAME: Open Waterways
${ModID}:OpenWaterways.DESCRIPTION: Increase ${ModID}:Sus applications by !M! for this turn.

${ModID}:SortRecords.NAME: Sort Records
${ModID}:SortRecords.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add 1 of 3 random cards to your hand.  It costs 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GasLighting.NAME: GasLighting
${ModID}:GasLighting.DESCRIPTION: Your ${ModID}:Vote counter does not increment for the first ${ModID}:Vote gained each turn.
